headline: S&P Global Schedules Third Quarter 2025 Earnings Announcement and Conference Call for Thursday, October 30, 2025
summary: S&P Global's (NYSE: SPGI) third quarter 2025 results will be issued on Thursday, October 30, 2025 via news release at approximately 7:15 a.m. Eastern Daylight Time. The news release will be available at www.spglobal.com.

headline: Echo Global keeps Moody’s B3 rating in tough market
summary: Echo Global B3 rating by Moody’s highlights steady earnings despite challenges in a soft freight market. The post Echo Global keeps Moody’s B3 rating in tough market appeared first on FreightWaves.

headline: S&P Global BMI Inclusion Might Change the Case for Investing in Weibo (WB)
summary: Weibo Corporation (SEHK:9898) was recently added to the S&P Global BMI Index, reflecting a significant milestone for the company and expanding its visibility among global investors. This index inclusion often prompts new interest from institutional investors and can result in increased trading activity due to portfolio rebalancing by funds that track the index. We'll examine how Weibo's addition to the S&P Global BMI Index could influence its long-term investment outlook and future growth...

headline: Will Moody's Robust 1H25 Revenue and Earnings Growth Continue?
summary: MCO's posts solid first-half 2025 revenue and EPS growth on acquisitions and demand for high-quality credits, but can the momentum hold?

headline: S&P Dow Jones Indices Announces Leadership Succession
summary: S&P Dow Jones Indices ("S&P DJI"), the world's leading index provider, has appointed Catherine Clay as CEO, effective November 1, 2025. She will replace Dan Draper, who will remain as a Special Advisor for a period of time after November 1, 2025. Ms. Clay will also replace Mr. Draper on the S&P Dow Jones Indices Board.

raw.headline: S&P Dow Jones Indices Announces Leadership Succession

headline: S&P Global Announces Updates to the Executive Leadership Team
summary: S&P Global (NYSE: SPGI) today announced updates to the Executive Leadership Team as part of the company's ongoing evolution to support its strategic priorities and continued growth.
